member.name: T:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize
member.summary: Represents a byte size value with support for decimal (KiloByte) and binary values (KibiByte).

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.BytesInKibiByte
member.summary: Number of bytes in 1 kibibyte.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.BytesInMebiByte
member.summary: Number of bytes in 1 mebibyte.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.BytesInGibiByte
member.summary: Number of bytes in 1 gibibyte.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.BytesInTebiByte
member.summary: Number of bytes in 1 tebibyte.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.BytesInPebiByte
member.summary: Number of bytes in 1 pebibyte.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.KibiByteSymbol
member.summary: Kibibyte symbol.

member.summary: Mebibyte symbol.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.GibiByteSymbol
member.summary: Gibibyte symbol.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.TebiByteSymbol
member.summary: Tebibyte symbol.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.PebiByteSymbol
member.summary: Pebibyte symbol.

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.KibiBytes
member.summary: Gets the number of kibibytes represented by this object.

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.MebiBytes
member.summary: Gets the number of mebibytes represented by this object.

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.GibiBytes
member.summary: Gets the number of gibibytes represented by this object.

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.TebiBytes
member.summary: Gets the number of tebibytes represented by this object.

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.PebiBytes
member.summary: Gets the number of pebibytes represented by this object.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.ToBinaryString
member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to a binary byte string. The prefix symbol (bit, byte, kibi, mebi, etc.) used is the largest prefix such that the corresponding value is greater than or equal to one.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.ToBinaryString(System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to a binary byte string. The prefix symbol (bit, byte, kibi, mebi, etc.) used is the largest prefix such that the corresponding value is greater than or equal to one. Use for decimal string representation.
member.param: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.MinValue
member.summary: Minimum number of allowed bits in an instance.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.MaxValue
member.summary: Maximum number of allowed bits in an instance.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.BitsInByte
member.summary: Number of bits in 1 byte.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.BitSymbol
member.summary: Bit symbol.

member.name: F:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.ByteSymbol
member.summary: Byte symbol.

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Bits
member.summary: Gets the number of bits represented by this object.

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Bytes
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes represented by this object.

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.LargestWholeNumberBinarySymbol
member.summary:
Gets the largest whole number binary symbol. Example:
- 1024 KiB will return MiB
- 1023 KiB will return KiB

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.LargestWholeNumberDecimalSymbol
member.summary:
Gets the largest whole number decimal symbol. Example:
- 1000 KB will return MB
- 999 KB will return KB

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.LargestWholeNumberBinaryValue
member.summary:
Gets the largest whole number binary value. Example:
- 1024 KiB will return 1
- 1023 KiB will return 1023

member.name: P:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.LargestWholeNumberDecimalValue
member.summary:
Gets the largest whole number decimal value. Example:
- 1000 KB will return 1
- 999 KB will return 999

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.#ctor(System.Int64)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the structure to the specified number of units.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the structure to the specified number of units.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.ToString
member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to a decimal byte string. The prefix symbol (bit, byte, kilo, mega, etc.) used is the largest prefix such that the corresponding value is greater than or equal to one. Use for binary string representation.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.ToString(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to a decimal byte string. The prefix symbol (bit, byte, kilo, mega, etc.) used is the largest prefix such that the corresponding value is greater than or equal to one. Use for binary string representation.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to a decimal byte string. The prefix symbol (bit, byte, kilo, mega, etc.) used is the largest prefix such that the corresponding value is greater than or equal to one. Use for binary string representation.
member.param: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to a decimal byte string. The prefix symbol (bit, byte, kilo, mega, etc.) used is the largest prefix such that the corresponding value is greater than or equal to one. Use for binary string representation.
member.param: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
to use binary byte values (1 KiB = 1024) instead of decimal values (1 KB = 1000 B).

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether an instance has equal number of bits to this instance.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Equals(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Indicates whether an instance has equal number of bits to this instance.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.CompareTo(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Compares this instance's bit count to the other instance's bit count.
member.returns:
A signed number indicating the relative values of this instance and other.
Negative return value: this instance is less than the one specified.
Zero return value: this instance is equal to the one specified.
Positive return value: this instance is greater than the one specified.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Add(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Returns a new object whose value is the sum of the specified value and this instance.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Subtract(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Returns a new object whose value is the difference of the specified value and this instance.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_Increment(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Returns an instance whose value is 1 byte greater than this instance.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_UnaryNegation(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Returns a new instance whose value is the negative value of the specified instance.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_Decrement(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Returns a new instance whose value is 1 byte less than this instance.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_Multiply(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Multiply two instances.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_Division(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Divides two instances.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_Equality(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Indicates whether two instances have equal number of bits.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_Inequality(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Indicates whether two instances have different number of bits.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_LessThan(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Indicates whether one instance has less bits than the other.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_LessThanOrEqual(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Indicates whether one instance has less or equal bits than the other.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_GreaterThan(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Indicates whether one instance has more bits than the other.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_GreaterThanOrEqual(ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Indicates whether one instance has more bits or equal than the other.

member.name: M:ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a binary or decimal byte to its equivalent.
member.param: A string that contains a to convert.

An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

Number style of the string being parsed.
An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

member.summary: Converts the string representation of a binary or decimal byte to its equivalent. Return value indicates success or failure of the parsing.

Object reference to store the result if successful.
